lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has called on his side to gird for an inspired performance from recently out-of-sorts Stoke City when they play on Saturday at Britannia Stadium.

headline.print_headline: Allardyce Urges Sunderland to Be Prepared for Fired-Up Stoke
headline.main: Allardyce Urges Sunderland to Be Prepared for Fired-Up Stoke

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has called on his side to gird for an inspired performance from recently out-of-sorts Stoke City when they play on Saturday at Britannia Stadium....
